sentences.en: So ever since that tram ride I have never caught a glimpse of the reader, the audience, the customer, the patron, without instantly trying to wedge myself into the rocks above the black tarn of doubt.
sentences.cn: 所以，自那次坐电车以后，我只要望读者、听众、顾客、庇护人一眼，就恨不得挤到黑黝黝的怀疑之湖上空的峻岩空隙里躲起来。

sentences.en: The deep and dark tarn at my feet closed over the fragments of the House of Usher.
sentences.cn: 我脚下深邃阴沉的小湖将厄谢尔古屋的断垣残墙吞没了.

sentences.en: The goods are to be tarn ( s ) shipped at Honk.
This pool or tarn was encircled by tree!
sentences.cn: 这个池塘,或是说山潭吧,四周全被树木围了起来.
